title: Rainy city driving with moderate speed and frequent braking.
caption: A red car drives down a rainy city street with tall buildings and palm trees on either side.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 7.6 m/s). There are 7 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars on the street, some of which are also braking frequently. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and there are a few pedestrians walking on the sidewalk. The weather is overcast, and the visibility is moderate.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. It frequently brakes to avoid collisions with other vehicles that are also braking frequently. The tall buildings and palm trees on either side of the street create a picturesque cityscape, but they also limit visibility around the curves. The ego vehicle must remain vigilant and adjust its speed and direction accordingly to ensure a safe journey.
